whyshuteye.EasiestAndMonetizeHouse: E a forma mais simples e rentavel de rentabilizar a tua casa
whyshuteye.SimpleClientDescription: Easy to book at last minute in only 3 clicks
whyshuteye.NearClientDescription: Spaces close to you or to your office

howistart.ClientDescription: Shuteye never was so easy and cheap:
howistart.StartDescription: Book the space you most like for the duration you want (from 30 minutes) and enjoy the experience.
howistart.RegistYouDescription: Fill out your data and preferences. We suggest you the spaces that match your criteria and are most convenient to you.
howistart.SearchDescription: Look for the ideal space (within our suggestions or without), check out photos of the space and feedback from previous guests.
